item.title: Our empirical paper on the optimization characteristics of linear Transformers got accepted to ICLR 2024!
I had the honor to take part in the Fifth Korean-American Kavli Frontiers of Science Symposium as a session speaker.
Two papers got accepted to the NeurIPS 2023 Workshop on Mathematics of Modern Machine Learning (M3L)! (update: both papers were selected for **oral presentations!**)
Four papers got accepted to NeurIPS 2023; among them, our SAM analysis paper was selected for a **spotlight presentation!** Congratulations and thank you to my co-authors!
Our paper on the convergence properties of Sharpness-Aware Minimization was selected for the **Outstanding Paper Award** at the 2023 Korean AI Association Conference (CKAIA 2023)!
Three papers got accepted to ICML 2023. I'm delighted that one of them was selected for an **oral presentation!**
I will be serving as an area chair for NeurIPS 2023. This is my first time ACing!
One paper got accepted to ICLR 2023!

I have organized and will be chairing two sessions on “Mathematical Theory of AI” at the 2022 Korean AI Association-NAVER Joint Conference (JKAIA 2022). Also, I am pleased to announce that our submission on shuffling-based stochastic gradient descent-ascent won the **NAVER Outstanding Theory Paper Award** at the conference!
Check out our new preprint on the analysis of shuffling-based stochastic gradient descent-ascent!
I had an interview (in Korean) with the Electronic & Information Research Information Center (EIRIC). Sharing this for prospective students who want to know more about my research goals!
I will be presenting our paper on the analysis of shuffling-based federated optimization methods at ICLR 2022. Our paper was selected for an ***oral presentation!*** (Top 1.6% of all submissions)
Hello World! This brand new website of mine is finally up and running. I'm excited to join KAIST at the end of this month.
